resources:
testSportTaskProject Check your internet connection!
Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Your training plan for the week!
// monday train
15 supermen
10 pullovers in hollow with rubber
Е3/12 
 6-8 pull-ups with a kip to the chin or to the chest 
 4 shuttle runs with a touch 
 6-8 pull-ups with a kip to the chin or to the chest 
 4 shuttle runs with a touch 
 6-8 pull-ups with a kip to the chin or to the chest
5х: 
 16 jerks 22,5/15 
 12/12 renegade pulls 22,5/15 
 48 dumbbell jumps 
 
 cap: 17 minute
3х: 
 30-35 second extensions with dumbbells from behind the head while sitting 
 30-35 second T-lifts with dumbbells
// tuesday train
5 minutes of cardio
E3,5/10,5
 10-12 pullovers with dumbbells
 20-25 facial pulls
2x:
 1500/1200 m. rowing or 70/55 calories bike
 25 run shuttle 8 m.
 
 cap: 25 minute
Stretching
// wednesday train
10 lifts of a 6/4 kg medball in front of you
 10 squats with a medball at the chest"
E3,5/14
 8 frontal squats
 12 reverse snow angels (first 3 approaches)

2x:
 6-4-2 burpee with a 50/30 kg slamball lift on the shoulder
 15-12-9 pull-ups (w:-2)
 24-24-24 scissors on the pancake in the stop

3x:
 15-17/15-17 o/legs buttock bridges with dumbbells supported on a bench
 30-40"/30-40" side plank
// thursday train
15 supermen

10 pullovers in hollow with rubber
AMRAP: 8 minute
 5 rope lifts from a lying position with legs on 3 pancakes / 8 tracks
 4 shuttles of farm carrying 2 weights 32/24 kg.
 30 Russian twists with medball 6/4 kg / pendulums through medball
 
 rest 4 minute
Stretching
// friday train
5 minutes of cardio
E4/12 
 12-13 Arnold bench presses with kettlebells
 14-15/14-15 dumbbell pull to the belt with an emphasis on the bench
3x:
 5/5 barbell takes 60/40
 25 synchronous jumping bars
 40 air squats (10 each)

Stretching
